hero.headline: Responsive web templates tailored to your clients
hero.description: Pre-built sections and components help you deliver a customized draft as soon as an order comes in. Speed up your projects with a consistent design system and reusable pieces.

highlights.title: Why teams rely on us
highlights.subtitle: We pre-build the sections and flows you need most often so you can adapt them quickly to every project.

responsive.title: Responsive grid system
responsive.description: Tailwind CSS utilities deliver pixel-perfect layouts on every screen size.

branding.title: Brand-friendly design
branding.description: Adjust colors, typography, and components to reflect each brand identity in minutes.

templates.title: Ready-to-ship pages
templates.description: Home, services, product, and portfolio pages prebuilt for rapid delivery.

workflow.title: 3-step delivery workflow
workflow.description: Most drafts ship within two days thanks to our streamlined, template-driven process.

steps.title: Select template & gather brand assets
steps.description: Match the client use case, then collect brand colors, logo, and tone of voice.

steps.title: Assemble sections & customize
steps.description: Compose hero, services, CTAs, and visuals to align with the brand narrative.

steps.title: QA & handoff
steps.description: Run responsive and accessibility checks, capture revisions, and prepare delivery.

testimonials.title: Feedback from partners
testimonials.subtitle: Studios and freelancers use these templates to accelerate delivery without sacrificing quality.

items.name: Kim Pro
items.quote: With pre-built templates we recreate the client's desired flow in half a day. Customizing details is effortless, and satisfaction is high.

items.name: Lee Designer
items.quote: The grid and components are so well organized that my turnaround time doubled. Mobile responsiveness works from the start.

items.name: Park Dev
items.quote: Vite + React keeps builds fast, and Tailwind ensures consistent styling, making maintenance easy.

service.title: Service overview template
service.description: Perfect for agencies and professional services. Put pricing, FAQs, and core value propositions in front of your clients instantly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Ideal when you need to highlight a clear service process and build trustâ€”consulting, marketing, education, and more.

product.title: Product landing template
product.description: A flexible structure for SaaS, digital goods, and courses. Showcase features, benefits, and pricing clearly.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Best suited for SaaS startups, subscription services, and online education that need to explain product value quickly.

portfolio.title: Portfolio showcase template
portfolio.description: Designed for freelancers, studios, and creators. Present your best work, process, and client feedback in a cohesive story.

recommendations.title: Recommended for
recommendations.description: Great for design studios, personal portfolios, and media teams that need to emphasize visual references.

footer.description: Discover your love style through our MBTI-based love type test.

lovetype.title: LoveType
lovetype.subtitle: Discover your unique love type
lovetype.description: A love type test that analyzes your romantic style through 4 dimensions: leadership, affection expression, relationship views, and attitude.
lovetype.question: Question
lovetype.agreementQuestion: How much do you agree with A or B?
lovetype.exploreAllTypes: Explore all love types and find yours
lovetype.shareText: My love type is {{type}}! Check out your love type too ðŸ’•
lovetype.helpText: Please select the answer that best fits you. Be honest for accurate results.

features.mbtiDesc: Accurate analysis based on scientifically validated MBTI theory
features.loveDesc: More accurate results with love and relationship specialized questions
features.matchDesc: Provides compatibility with other types and love advice

questions.1: When looking for a new restaurant with my partner, who usually suggests it first?
questions.2: When a date plan suddenly falls through, what's your reaction?
questions.3: When planning a weekend trip with your partner, how do you usually prepare?
questions.4: After a fight with your partner, who usually initiates reconciliation?
questions.5: When starting a new challenge or hobby together, what's your role?
questions.6: When deciding on food menus, which side are you on?
questions.7: When you receive an unexpected surprise event from your partner, what's your next action?
questions.8: When your partner is struggling, how do you usually react?
questions.9: When your partner says you're "cute," what's your honest feeling?
questions.10: When you encounter your partner's minor complaints or childish behavior, what's your reaction?
questions.11: What's your thought on physical intimacy with your partner?
questions.12: When listening to your partner's worries, what's your usual attitude?
questions.13: On anniversaries or special days, what kind of gift do you want from your partner?
questions.14: What's the image of a partner that suddenly comes to mind?
questions.15: What's the most effective way to reconcile after a fight with your partner?
questions.16: When celebrating an anniversary with your partner, what do you value more?
questions.17: Do you have fantasies about proposals or weddings with your partner?
questions.18: What's your financial management style during dating?
questions.19: When you feel that love has cooled, what's your coping method?
questions.21: After marriage, what's your ideal weekend with your partner?
questions.22: After starting to date your partner, how do you use your personal time?
questions.23: When your partner shows excessive jealousy or clinginess, what's your reaction?
questions.24: How long after a breakup before you start a new relationship?
questions.25: When you hear advice about dating from friends, what's your reaction?
questions.26: Do you think you must share hobbies or interests with your partner?
questions.27: What's your view on natural interactions with the opposite sex during dating?
questions.28: How much of your honest emotions do you express during dating?
questions.1.optionA: I tend to actively search and suggest it first
questions.1.optionB: I wait for my partner's suggestion or look for it together
questions.2.optionA: I quickly come up with a new alternative and take the lead
questions.2.optionB: I listen to my partner's opinion and follow what they want
questions.3.optionA: I research destinations and accommodations in detail and suggest them
questions.3.optionB: I listen to my partner's opinions and prefer to prepare while discussing together
questions.4.optionA: I tend to take the lead in conversation to improve the relationship
questions.4.optionB: I wait for my partner's reconciliation gesture or gently accept it
questions.5.optionA: I take the lead in finding methods and guiding my partner
questions.5.optionB: I follow my partner's lead and enjoy it together
questions.6.optionA: I clearly decide what I want to eat and suggest it
questions.6.optionB: I tend to go along with what my partner wants to eat
questions.7.optionA: I also plan and execute a surprise event for my partner
questions.7.optionB: I gratefully enjoy my partner's thoughtfulness and affection
questions.8.optionA: I actively comfort them and want to help solve the problem together
questions.8.optionB: I quietly support them from the side and try to understand their feelings
questions.9.optionA: When I hear that, I want to act even more spoiled and feel good
questions.9.optionB: I feel proud and satisfied that they've accepted me as I am
questions.10.optionA: I find it cute and lovely, so I want to accept it even more
questions.10.optionB: Seeing that makes me want to act spoiled myself
questions.11.optionA: I think it's an important means to express and confirm affection
questions.11.optionB: It's a natural part of communication, and it's important that my partner feels comfortable
questions.12.optionA: I deeply empathize with their emotions and comfort them by sharing their sadness
questions.12.optionB: I tend to quietly listen to their story and stay by their side
questions.13.optionA: A customized gift that they prepared with care, knowing my tastes exactly
questions.13.optionB: Any gift with my partner's heart in it, I'll gladly accept it
questions.15.optionA: Sit down calmly, analyze the cause of the problem, and find a rational solution
questions.15.optionB: Honestly share each other's feelings and resolve it through heartfelt communication
questions.16.optionA: Exchanging practical and necessary gifts and feeling realistic joy
questions.16.optionB: Creating touching events or special memories that leave a strong impression
questions.17.optionA: I dream of a magnificent, romantic event that will be memorable
questions.17.optionB: I think simple and realistic is fine if the sincerity is there
questions.18.optionA: I tend to spend and save money planfully for the future
questions.18.optionB: I tend to invest generously for current happiness and enjoyment
questions.19.optionA: I calmly accept the emotional change and seek ways to organize the relationship
questions.19.optionB: I try to reignite the passion or suffer emotionally to restore the relationship
questions.20.optionA: It's about pursuing stability and happiness through a realistic partnership
questions.20.optionB: It's the fruition of passionate love and life's most romantic promise
questions.21.optionA: Spend time on self-development for the future or achieving common goals
questions.21.optionB: Reignite love through spontaneous dates or new experiences
questions.22.optionA: Even while dating, my appointments with friends or personal hobbies don't change much
questions.22.optionB: I prioritize my partner and focus most of my time on spending with them
questions.23.optionA: It's a bit burdensome, but I think 'they really like me' and let it go
questions.23.optionB: I feel it's a serious relationship problem and want to talk about it seriously
questions.24.optionA: The next relationship starts naturally when the right connection comes along
questions.24.optionB: After sufficiently grieving and organizing the relationship, I carefully prepare for the next one
questions.25.optionA: I take it as reference, but ultimately decide according to my own heart
questions.25.optionB: I seriously consider my friends' advice and carefully reflect on it
questions.26.optionA: I respect each other's hobbies, and while time together is important, personal time is also necessary
questions.26.optionB: I want to share each other's hobbies or interests for a deeper relationship
questions.27.optionA: As long as my partner doesn't get jealous, it's okay to socialize widely
questions.27.optionB: While dating, I try not to create opportunities for misunderstanding
questions.28.optionA: Sometimes I freely express my emotions without hiding them
questions.28.optionB: I consider my partner and control my emotions, expressing them carefully

LCRO.title: Reliable Cutiepie
LCRO.description: Usually leads relationships with realistic judgment, but shows surprising charm by acting cute in front of loved ones. Pursues stable relationships while being optimistic and wanting affection through adorable gestures. A charming type that combines reliability with cuteness.
LCRO.advice: Maintain realistic judgment while not forgetting emotional connection with your partner.

LCRP.title: Thoughtful Sweetie
LCRP.description: Takes relationships seriously and pursues perfection, but becomes completely disarmed showing adorable sides to loved ones. Leads relationships realistically while maintaining passion, a lovely perfectionist who acts cute with sincere heart.
LCRP.advice: Pursue perfection but also learn to relax and enjoy.

LCPO.title: Passionate Charmer
LCPO.description: Owns an energetic love style bursting with passion and affection. Leads relationships proactively while expressing emotions freely, optimistically showing abundant love and enjoying acting cute with partner. An enthusiastic romantic who expresses love emotionally and creatively.
LCPO.advice: Be passionate but also respect your partner's pace and maintain balance.

LCPE.title: Devoted Kitten
LCPE.description: Like a cat, elegantly leads relationships but pours hot passion and cute affection to those who opened heart to. Seeks serious and deep relationships, devotedly acts cute expressing love to chosen partner. A passionate type with exceptional emotional depth.
LCPE.advice: Earnestness is good, but sometimes enjoy things lightly.

LARO.title: Cool Leader
LARO.description: Confidently leads relationships on surface but inwardly wishes partner to understand and accept true self. Creates stable relationships with realistic and optimistic attitude, a balanced type wanting someone who recognizes soft heart behind strong leadership.
LARO.advice: Leadership is good, but also be open to your partner's affection.

LARE.title: Charismatic Perfectionist
LARE.description: Leads relationships with strong charisma and earnest attitude pursuing perfection, yet inwardly yearns for partner's warm understanding and acceptance. Approaches relationships realistically with responsibility, a reliable type wanting trustworthy partner who recognizes sincerity behind perfect exterior.
LARE.advice: Earnestness is important, but sometimes flexibility in accepting your partner is needed.

LAPO.title: Free Spirit
LAPO.description: A creative type who leads relationships freely and passionately while wanting inclusive partner who accepts emotions and individuality as they are. Enjoys new experiences with optimistic and attractive personality, cherishes expressing love in unique ways. Owner of distinctive charm where freedom and passion coexist.
LAPO.advice: Exercise passionate leadership while also accepting your partner's emotions.

LAPE.title: Fatalist
LAPE.description: Takes love seriously like destiny, leads relationships with strong leadership while seeking soulmate who understands and accepts deep inner emotions. Devotes earnestly while being passionate, pursues profound love pouring everything to chosen person. Believer of destined love with intense emotions and authenticity.
LAPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but be careful not to overwhelm your partner.

FCRO.title: Gentle Hamster
FCRO.description: Like a hamster, adorable and gentle personality that matches partner's pace well while occasionally acting cute expressing affection. Supports stable relationships with realistic and optimistic attitude, naturally radiates cute charm in harmonious atmosphere. Peaceful love style sharing tender love without being burdensome.
FCRO.advice: Follow your partner but also actively express your own opinions.

FCRE.title: Diligent Bunny
FCRE.description: Like a bunny, gentle and diligent following partner while cutely acting spoiled expressing love with sincere heart. A devoted type approaching relationships with realistic and trustworthy attitude, adorable when depending on partner with affection. Reliable lover building deep trust with genuine heart and diligence.
FCRE.advice: Earnestness is good, but sometimes enjoy things leisurely.

FCPO.title: Sparkling Puppy
FCPO.description: Like a puppy, bright and affectionate personality that passionately expresses love and enjoys acting spoiled. An adorable type matching partner's pace with optimistic and accepting attitude while valuing emotional connection and wanting to be loved with cute charm. Owner of sparkling charm with abundant energy and affection expression.
FCPO.advice: Passion is good, but also have the courage to express your own needs.

FCPE.title: Devoted Lover
FCPE.description: Devotes wholeheartedly to loved one, owner of deep love who passionately acts spoiled and expresses affection. Approaches relationships seriously while respecting partner's pace, creates special relationship with cute affection and deep emotional connection. True lover dreaming of becoming one with sincere devotion and passion.
FCPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but also take care of your own happiness.

FARO.title: Comfortable Companion
FARO.description: A harmonious type pursuing comfortable and natural relationships, following partner's lead while wishing to be accepted as is. Creates stable relationships with realistic and optimistic attitude, accepting yet wanting recognition of own presence. Ideal companion where comfort and stability coexist.
FARO.advice: Follow your partner while also expressing what you want.

FARE.title: Cautious Supporter
FARE.description: A trustworthy type that solidly supports partner with cautious and realistic attitude while wanting partner who recognizes and accepts own sincerity and efforts. Approaches relationships earnestly with responsibility, builds deep trust with partner through quiet but firm support. Reliable supporter proving love with diligence and authenticity.
FARE.advice: Earnestness is important, but don't forget emotional connection.

FAPO.title: Romantic Dreamer
FAPO.description: A sensitive type who dreams of passionate and romantic love, following partner's lead while wishing understanding and acceptance of own sensibility and emotions. Values emotional connection with optimistic and attractive personality, accepting yet passionately falling in love as true romantic. Pursues harmony between dreamlike love and reality.
FAPO.advice: Passion is good, but also have the courage to express your needs.

FAPE.title: Pure Heart
FAPE.description: A sincere type who loves one person deeply and seriously, passionately devoting while wishing partner to recognize and cherish pure heart. Respects partner's pace sharing deep connection, creates destined love with accepting yet earnest attitude. Pure heart dreaming of lifetime love with pure passion and devotion.
FAPE.advice: Earnest passion is good, but also value your own happiness.
